## PushedModal interface

A modal pushed to the modal store

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PushedModal<Component extends ModalComponentBase> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [component](./modal.pushedmodal.component.md) |  | ComponentType&lt;Component&gt; | component to render in modal layout |
|  [id](./modal.pushedmodal.id.md) |  | string | default to new uuid |
|  [props](./modal.pushedmodal.props.md) |  | ComponentProps&lt;Component&gt; | props passed to modal component |
